text: Gregory Anthony Halman (August 26, 1987 â€“ November 21, 2011) was a Dutch professional baseball outfielder. He played with the Seattle Mariners of Major League Baseball during the 2010 and 2011 seasons. He also played internationally with the Dutch national team, playing in the 2009 World Baseball Classic. == Death == Halman was killed in a stabbing on November 21, 2011 in Rotterdam. His brother Jason Halman was held by police after the incident. == References == Category:1987 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Dutch murder victims Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:People murdered in the Netherlands Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Sportspeople from Haarlem
title: Greg Halman
